Interface AccountUserInvitationsApi

    • Method Detail

      • createInvitation

        @Headers(value="Content-Type:application/json")
 @POST(value="v3/user-invitations")
retrofit2.Call<UserInvitationResp> createInvitation(@Body
                                                                                                                                          UserInvitationReq body)
        Create a user invitation. Invite a new or existing user. **Example:** ``` curl -X POST https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/user-invitations \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' \\ -H 'content-type: application/json' \\ -d {\"email\": \"myemail@company.com\"} ```
        Parameters:
        body - A user invitation object with attributes. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<UserInvitationResp>

      • deleteInvitation

        @DELETE(value="v3/user-invitations/{invitation_id}")
retrofit2.Call<java.lang.Void> deleteInvitation(@Path(value="invitation_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                      java.lang.String invitationId)
        Delete a user invitation. Delete an active user invitation sent to a new or existing user. **Example:** ``` curl -X DELETE https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/user-invitations/{invitation_id} \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' ```
        Parameters:
        invitationId - The ID of the invitation to delete. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<Void>

      • getAllInvitations

        @GET(value="v3/user-invitations")
retrofit2.Call<UserInvitationRespList> getAllInvitations(@Query(value="limit")
                                                                                            java.lang.Integer limit,
                                                                                            @Query(value="after")
                                                                                            java.lang.String after,
                                                                                            @Query(value="order")
                                                                                            java.lang.String order,
                                                                                            @Query(value="login_profiles__eq")
                                                                                            java.lang.String loginProfilesEq)
        Get the details of all user invitations. Retrieve details for all the active user invitations. **Example:** ``` curl -X GET https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/user-invitations \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' ```
        Parameters:
        limit - The number of results to return (2-1000). Default 50. (optional, default to 50)
        after - The entity ID to fetch after the given one. (optional)
        order - Record order based on creation time. Acceptable values: ASC, DESC. Default: ASC. (optional, default to ASC)
        loginProfilesEq - Filter to retrieve user invitations by a specified login profile. (optional)
        Returns:
        Call<UserInvitationRespList>

      • getInvitation

        @GET(value="v3/user-invitations/{invitation_id}")
retrofit2.Call<UserInvitationResp> getInvitation(@Path(value="invitation_id",encoded=true)
                                                                                                    java.lang.String invitationId)
        Details of a user invitation. Retrieve the details of an active user invitation. **Example:** ``` curl -X GET https://api.us-east-1.mbedcloud.com/v3/user-invitations/{invitation_id} \\ -H 'Authorization: Bearer <api_key>' ```
        Parameters:
        invitationId - The ID of the invitation to retrieve. (required)
        Returns:
        Call<UserInvitationResp>
